bilingual.source: The trend showed it slowly moving toward Canada.
bilingual.target: 这一趋势显示它正在缓慢地向加拿大移动。

bilingual.source: Earth's fast-changing water mass is moving the North Pole.
bilingual.target: 地球快速变化的水质量正在移动北极。

bilingual.source: A large number of people are moving towards Times Square for the countdown to midnight.
bilingual.target: 许多人正在向时代广场移动，准备迎接午夜倒计时。
轮子使移动变得更容易。

bilingual.source: The car in front is moving ahead very slowly.
The forklift driver is moving a pallet.
bilingual.target: 叉车司机正在移动一块栈板。

bilingual.source: The hands on the clock have stopped moving.
bilingual.target: 时钟上的指针停止了移动。

list.abstract: 《Moving》，美国电影，阿兰·麦特、Alan Metter导演，理查德·普赖尔、Beverly Todd、斯黛西·达什主演。发行公司：Warner Home Vdeo。对白：英语。

yingyinNormal.en: What? They can't hit us if we keep moving.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么？我们一直移动的话他们就攻击不了我们。

yingyinNormal.en: One neuron and you're alive, two neurons you're moving.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一个神经元让你生存，两个神经元让你移动。

yingyinNormal.en: Does anyone else feel she should be moving in slow motion?
yingyinNormal.zh: 有其他人认为她应该以慢动作移动吗？

yingyinNormal.en: We're moving so slowly. We'll never get to Granny and grandpa's.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们移动的好慢。我们永远也到不了爷爷奶奶家了。

yingyinNormal.en: And when the Earth was moving in the opposite direction, they expected it to go slower.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且，当地球与光束作反方向移动时，光的速度会减慢。

yingyinNormal.en: Thus, time must tick at different rates for people moving relative to each other.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以 当人们对他人相对地移动时，时间一定以不一样的速率流逝。

yingyinNormal.en: When a beam of light was moving in the same direction as the Earth, they expected the light to travel faster.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们以为， 当一束光和地球往同一个方向移动时,光的速度会更快。

yingyinNormal.en: Grandpa Pig speaking. We're almost at your house. But the traffic is still moving at the speed of a snail. A very, very slow snail.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是猪爷爷。我们就快到你家了。但是车流还是在以蜗牛的速度在移动。一只很慢很慢的蜗牛。

yingyinNormal.en: So we're back. Subway car, you lock eyes. You fall into his lap, you grab Lucas by the face. You start moving toward him and…
yingyinNormal.zh: 那我们继续说刚刚的事。地铁上，你们对上了眼，你坐上了他的大腿，你抱住了卢卡斯的头，你开始慢慢朝他移动，然后……

yingyinNormal.en: Why, are you moving out? I'm not moving out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么，你要搬吗？我不搬呐。

yingyinNormal.en: Grug, we have to keep moving.
yingyinNormal.zh: 瓜哥，我们得继续前进了。

yingyinNormal.en: Moving on? You're going AWOL?
yingyinNormal.zh: 离开？你们要擅自离开？

yingyinNormal.en: Is he moving back? I don't know.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他要搬回来了吗？我不知道。

yingyinNormal.en: So, does Joey know you're moving?
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔伊知道你要搬家吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Overruled. Let's keep this moving.
yingyinNormal.zh: 反对无效，不要耽误进度。

yingyinNormal.en: So, what's your plan moving forward?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你接下来有什么计划？

yingyinNormal.en: The minute you sneeze web, I'm moving out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你只要擤出蜘蛛网来，我立马就搬家。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, whoa, slow down. No, keep moving. Wow.
yingyinNormal.zh: 慢一点！不，你走吧。

yingyinNormal.en: It's not you, Howard. He says he's moving out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 霍华德，不关你事，他说他要搬出去。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, Phoebe that's fine because I'm not moving.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没关系，因为我不搬了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 动；移动；变动；团体；乐章；机械装置；可动装置；运动；活动；动向
adj. 行进的；活动的；动人的；感人的

word_family.mean: v. 动；移动；改变位置；改变状态；进展；发展；在…中进行社交活动；动议；提议；使（肠）排空

examination_example.sentence: "We'd assumed we'd have to give it a <highlight>moving</highlight> head and tail, facial features, and put a scent on it."
examination_example.sentence_trans: “我们认为我们必须给它一个活动的头和尾巴，面部特征，并让它身上带有气味。”

examination_example.sentence: Today, widespread social pressure together with increasingly high expectations in a fast-<highlight>moving</highlight> world often causes students to overlook the possibility of taking a gap year．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，在一个快速发展的世界里，广泛的社会压力和越来越高的期望经常导致学生忽视间隔年的可能性。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 动；移动；变动；团体；乐章；机械装置；可动装置；运动；活动；动向
adj. 行进的；活动的；动人的；感人的

word_family.mean: v. 动；移动；改变位置；改变状态；进展；发展；在…中进行社交活动；动议；提议；使（肠）排空

examination_example.sentence: Electric cars have one main <highlight>moving</highlight> part: the motor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电动汽车有一个主要的运动部件:马达。

examination_example.sentence: Some pieces of ice are huge, like <highlight>moving</highlight> islands.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些冰块很大，像移动的岛屿。

examination_example.sentence: I discovered that lions were afraid of a <highlight>moving</highlight> light.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我发现狮子害怕移动的光线。

examination_example.sentence: A few hours ago, Scott shared this <highlight>moving</highlight> story on the Internet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几个小时前，斯科特在网上分享了这个感人的故事。

examination_example.sentence: When hundreds of colorful balloons flew up high, the sky of Albuquerque became a <highlight>moving</highlight> cartoon.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当数百个彩色气球高高地飞起来时，阿尔伯克基的天空变成了一幅动人的漫画。

examination_example.sentence: Although it may be old, I still think it's a <highlight>moving</highlight> story.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然可能比较老套，但我还是觉得这是一个感人的故事。
